Title: Object: Alexandria. San-Stefano Casino
Description: Postcard; printed paper; hand-coloured photograph showing the entrance to the San-Stefano casino in Alexandria with pollarded trees either side of the path.
Producer name: Published by: The Cairo Postcard Trust
Curator's comments: Postally unused; although the card states San-Stefano Casino the inscription above the gate of the casino states Ramleh.
